Module org.crudeemail
Package org.crudeemail.controller

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
org.crudeemail.controller.AbstractController
org.crudeemail.controller.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController
extends AbstractController
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable

MainController

Controller for main.fxml. Holds TreeView, TableView, WebView, and other components for the main window. Handles how and what messages are displayed depending on the selected folder.
Version:
1.0

    • setMessageSelect

      private void setMessageSelect()
      Sets the current message to the selected message in the tableView. Goes through the process of clearing previous attachments in hBoxAttachments, loading attachments, MailProcess service, and setting the information labels on the right side of the window.

    • loadAttachments

      private void loadAttachments​(MailMessage mailMessage) throws jakarta.mail.MessagingException
      Loads attachments when there are attachments present in the mailMessage. Ignores null files.
      Parameters:
      mailMessage - mailMessage object to be processed
      Throws:
      jakarta.mail.MessagingException
